Nightshift looks back to Wolfgang with a slightly sarcastic look on his fac=
e.  Snow laces his ebony whiskers and frosts his jet black fur.  He ripples=
 it as the snow falls on him.

" Yeah, yeah.  Just wait till we get a job i=
n the tropics, when you're panting up a storm, I will be the one who's laug=
h'n.  Anyway we better not have ta be out here for too much longer, who kno=
ws who's out there,or what's out there, just look'n ta take us out."

Don't=
 be envious of what you don't have, be grateful for things you already poss=
es.  Nothing is worth more than family and friends.

On Nov 15, 2011, at 4:=
25 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> > <OLD>
> >
> > N=
ightshift's body was nowhere designed for cold climates. He shivers due to
=
> > the extremely cold temperature, and tries to stay very close to Polarcl=
aw to
> > keep reasonably warm.
> >
> > " Why couldn't the watchers pick a =
tropical climate instead of this? I'm
> > freez'n my tail off out here. Any=
way, where's that back door ya mentioned?
> > It's time for me ta go ta wor=
k."
> 
> WOLFGANG chuckled as he walked behind the group, apparently his fu=
rred
> body keeping him quite warm in the frigid temperatures. "Hey, if you=

> are finding it cold and difficult, think of how the Preds are going to
>=
 like it."
> 
> Shifting in robot mode POLAR still looks huge and massive, =
his body
> just large and well armored. He lifts a pair of bimoculars to hi=
s
> optics and points to a patch of snow near a small hill and a dip. "It
>=
 is there." He said talking about the back door. "It is hidden."
> 
> RAMUL=
US stopped and looked as well, although like the rest of them
> retained hi=
s beastmode.
> 
> "Come." POLAR CLAW said as he resumed his beastmode as we=
ll. "We have
> a descent ahead of us, and perhaps we can get inside and fin=
d out
> what's going on."
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Preston

gt; keep reasonably warm.<br>

k a tropical climate instead of this?  I'm<br>

or me ta go ta work."<br>
<br>
WOLFGANG chuckled as he walked behind the gr=
oup, apparently his furred<br>
body keeping him quite warm in the frigid te=
mperatures. "Hey, if you<br>
are finding it cold and difficult, think of ho=
w the Preds are going to<br>
like it."<br>
<br>
Shifting in robot mode POLA=
R still looks huge and massive, his body<br>
just large and well armored. H=
e lifts a pair of bimoculars to his<br>
optics and points to a patch of sno=
w near a small hill and a dip. "It<br>
is there." He said talking about the=
 back door. "It is hidden."<br>
<br>
RAMULUS stopped and looked as well, al=
though like the rest of them<br>
retained his beastmode.<br>
<br>
"Come." P=
OLAR CLAW said as he resumed his beastmode as well. "We have<br>
a descent =
ahead of us, and perhaps we can get inside and find out<br>
what's going on=
."<br>
